data.text: @SheenaWrightNYC @NYCMayor @AWilliamsIsom @MTorresSpringer Mass exits in NYC forced them to stop this draconian madness. If it continues i advice all residents and business head to a tax free state where you have freedom.
@SheenaWrightNYC @NYCMayor @AWilliamsIsom @MTorresSpringer Don't congratulate yourselves just yet. Kids under 5 ARE STILL MUZZLED. DISGRACEFUL
@SheenaWrightNYC @NYCMayor @AWilliamsIsom @MTorresSpringer @SheenaWrightNYC it's all meaningless until @NYCMayor decides to #unmaskourtoddlers

@SheenaWrightNYC @NYCMayor @AWilliamsIsom @MTorresSpringer Meanwhile, the homelessness is exploding, the subways & streets are not safe, stores being looted & shutting down.... Democrats bring you nothing destruction of YOUR standard of living! Where is building back better? Trump was 1000X better & everyone can see it now, finally.

@SheenaWrightNYC @NYCMayor @AWilliamsIsom @MTorresSpringer Yet you continue to mask toddlers, despite them being amongst the lowest at risk and having the most to lose with continued restrictions. It is shameful.
